fields.name: createdTime
fields.description: Event creating datetime

fields.name: dateTime
fields.description: The scheduled time of the event

fields.name: description
fields.description: Description of the event. Visibility may be limited for private groups

fields.name: duration
fields.description: Duration of the event

fields.name: endTime
fields.description: Time when event ends

fields.name: eventHosts
fields.description: List of event hosts

fields.name: eventType
fields.description: Type of the event

fields.name: eventUrl
fields.description: Name used for the event's web address on meetup.com. Must be between 6 and 60 characters

fields.name: feeSettings
fields.description: Optional organizer-defined fee payment settings

fields.name: group
fields.description: the group this event belongs to

fields.name: hostRsvps
fields.description: Returns a connection for the RSVP's for the hosts of the event.

fields.name: howToFindUs
fields.description:
String describing the location event venue. Visibility may be limited for private groups
For online events this field is used for the event's url.

fields.name: id
fields.description:
A unique but unstable identifier for the event.
Recurring events that have see activity may change the value of this identifier.

fields.name: isAttending
fields.description: True the current member attending this event

fields.name: isSaved
fields.description: True if the current member has saved this event

fields.name: maxTickets
fields.description: Maximum amount of RSVP spots for the event

fields.name: networkEvent
fields.description: Network event details

fields.name: rsvp
fields.description: Get the current member's RSVP for the event if any

fields.name: rsvpQuestions
fields.description: Get a list of RSVP questions for the event. Visibility may be limited

fields.name: rsvpSearch
fields.description: Search for members RSVP's in this event. Visibility may be limited for private groups

fields.name: rsvpState
fields.description:
Get the current member's RSVP state for the event
Uses own memberId if nothing was provided.

fields.name: rsvps
fields.description: Connections of filterable rsvps. Full list of information may be limited for private groups

args.name: sort
args.description:
Controls the sort order or results
Note: RsvpSort.sortField LOCAL_TIME and DATETIME are equivalant in this contetx and apply to the rsvp's updated field

fields.name: series
fields.description: If this event is part of a series, this field describes that series

fields.name: speakerDetails
fields.description: Speaker details

fields.name: status
fields.description: Current status of the event

fields.name: title
fields.description: The event title for  display

fields.name: token
fields.description: A unique and stable identifier for the event.

fields.name: topics
fields.description: A connection of topics for the event

fields.name: venues
fields.description:
Returns all venues for an event.
Will return a list of 1 venue for online or in person
Hybrid events will have 2 entries

fields.name: waitlistMode
fields.description: Waitlist handling when RSVP limit is reached

fields.name: zoomMeetingId
fields.description: A Zoom meeting ID if the event is online and uses Zoom integration.
